mapper.select: SELECT A.DIARY_ID, A.SCHDUL_ID, (SELECT SCHDUL_NM FROM COMTNSCHDULINFO WHERE SCHDUL_ID = A.SCHDUL_ID) SCHDUL_CN, A.DIARY_PROGRSRT, A.DIARY_NM, A.DRCT_MATTER, A.PARTCLR_MATTER, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNDIARYINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DIARY_ID = #{diaryId}
